version_description: Bug fixes and updated "My Routes" list
Bug fixes and updated "My Routes" list

- New Auto-Pause Feature, avoid accidentally leaving RunGo Paused, Auto-Pause will also resume automatically from a manual pause.
- Automatic updates of routes that have been edited on RunGo website
- General performance and memory improvements

- New Auto-Pause Feature, avoid accidentally leaving RunGo Paused, Auto-Pause will also resume automatically from a manual pause.
- Automatic updates of routes that have been edited on RunGo website
- General performance and memory improvements

- Improved Siri Support: Start a run or a route using Siri "Start Lunch Run with RunGo"
- Starting RunGo on the iPhone will automatically launch on the Apple Watch
- General Fixes and Improvements
- Proudly made in Canada, updated App icon to red for Canada 150.

- Improved Siri Support: Start a run or a route using Siri "Start Lunch Run with RunGo"
- Starting RunGo on the iPhone will automatically launch on the Apple Watch
- General Fixes and Improvements
- Proudly made in Canada, updated App icon to red for Canada 150.

Fix for issue with older versions of ios 10.

We are always focused on improving RunGo with new features, bug fixes and more. This update fixes some minor bugs and updates login.

We're always working on making RunGo better, fixing issues and improving features so you can keep running and creating great routes. In this version we have adding some fixes for our social sharing, improved workout logging in the Health app and more.

New RunGo online logbook to save runs both locally and online**
Connect to Strava*, to automatically sync RunGo runs to your Strava account.

* Premium Feature
** We care about your privacy so all online runs set to private by default.

This exciting update has improved RunGo on both iPhone and Apple Watch, with many great new features for RunGo on the Apple watch. We have also added support for the iPad (Wi-Fi + Cellular models only).

New Apple Watch Features:
- Apple Watch Series 4 Support
- Simple Route Map and Elevation Chart designed to be viewed on Apple Watch
- Scroll through Logbook History on Apple Watch using Digital Crown
- Interval timer now on Apple Watch
- Option to start run on Watch Only

New iPhone App Features:
- Updated Run Screen Design
- Support for Private Groups
- Improved Stability

Major update on RunGo for Apple Watch, Now you can search and download routes from your watch and use RunGo as an independent watch app.
RunGo is IOS 13 and WatchOS 6 ready and tested.
Enjoy the new iOS 13 Dark Mode, great for running at night and those early morning and evening runs this winter.
Better support for iPad for creating routes, we now support all iPad devices for route creation. Running and Navigation is only supported on GPS + Cellular iPad

NEW: SIMULATE RACES IN VIRTUAL MODE
Run famous races and bucket list routes from your treadmill, with voice-guided messages as you imagine running the course. Or run outdoors while virtually running a course across the world.

NEW: CHALLENGE YOURSELF WITH VIRTUAL RACES
Virtual races keep us motivated all year round. Follow courses peppered with custom voice messages as you run, including stories about landmarks and neighbourhoods, motivational points, and race highlights. Submit in-app to the race’s leaderboard for accurate and fair results

Fixes and general updates

Bug fixes and new features:
* Sometimes the navigation voice can be a bit too serious, so we’ve added real human-recorded messages to some of our verified routes! You might catch some famous runners or local leaders guiding you through your route or virtual race course. Available on select verified hotel and race routes.

* Elevation calculations are faster and more accurate
The hills are the same size in real life as before, and the routes just as challenging, but you might have an even more fun creating and following them now.eneral fixes and improvements

The hills are the same size in real life as before, and the routes just as challenging, but you might have an even more fun creating and following them now.eneral fixes and improvements

App stability is #1! Every release improves on this: better support for offline runs and navigations. iPad app is now better for creating and sharing routes.

Other updates include an easier to use logbook so you can track your progress over time and we have improved submitting to virtual races.
